title: Okros Tsikhe (Golden Fortress)
about: Okros Tsikhe (Golden Fortress)-  the fortress in Samtskhe-Javakheti region, Adigeni municipality, nearby the village Boladjuri, 170 m above sea level. The castle is located on a huge rocky massif and is difficult to reach (even inaccessible from some sides). It is one of the greatest Georgian fortresses.
